name: react-native-dual-screen
description: React Native package for dual screen devices support (Surface Duo, Neo)
author: Microsoft

scripts.init:package: cd example && npm i && npm run install:pods
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:kotlin && npm run lint:swift
scripts.ci:lint: npm run ci:lint:ts && npm run ci:lint:kotlin && npm run ci:lint:swift
scripts.ci:compile:ios: cd example/ios && export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER="true" && export RCT_NO_BUNDLE="true" && xcodebuild CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="" CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED="NO" CODE_SIGN_ENTITLEMENTS="" CODE_SIGNING_ALLOWED="NO" -workspace ReactNativeDualScreenExample.xcworkspace -configuration Debug -scheme ReactNativeDualScreenExample test
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run build
